means: 打开( crack的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: Out of beams and cracks came troops of beetles, ants and spiders.
sentence.Network_cn: 从横梁上和裂缝里爬出来了一群群甲虫、蚂蚁和蜘蛛。

sentence.Network_en: They would look out through the cracks of their weather-beaten door.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们会透过那扇经受风吹日晒的老木门的缝隙向外张望。

sentence.Network_en: Cracks, bulges, crumbling pointing and damp patches mean trouble.
sentence.Network_cn: 裂缝、凸起、剥落的勾缝和湿斑都意味着存在问题。

PerfectNetExp.abs: cracks 裂纹缺陷, cracks 裂缝的, cracks 裂缝宽度
The new plastic still cracks like common plastic ., 这种新型的塑料仍像普通塑料那样产生裂缝.

in the repair site , water pumps to the ground son immediately cracks in two plastic bags while the control pipe , and the remaining water into the cellar all wells .在抢修现场，抽水机将地面积水抽完后，立即用两根塑料管套住出现裂缝的水管，将管内的剩水全部倒入窨井。
The water is leaking in through the cracks ., 水正从裂缝中渗进来.

list.abs: 冶金词汇英语翻译(A-G) ... crack opening 裂纹张开 crack propagation 裂纹扩展 crack propagation criterion 裂纹扩展判据.
机械专业英语词汇（很全） - Lemon Tree ... quench hardening 淬火 quenching crack 淬火裂痕 recrystallization 再结晶.
鬓状裂纹 hair cracking砂纸纹 sanding scratch 凹坑 cratering 变色 discolorati.
焊接英语词汇 - wuhelo100的日志 - 网易博客 ... 裂纹 crack 表面裂纹 surface crack 咬边 undercut.

entry.def: If something hard cracks, or if you crack it, it becomes slightly damaged, with lines appearing on its surface.

example.ex: A gas main had cracked under my neighbour's garage and gas had seeped into our homes...
example.tran: 邻居车库下面的煤气总管裂开了，煤气渗入了我们家。

example.ex: Remove the dish from the oven, crack the salt crust and you will find the skin just peels off the fish.
example.tran: 把盘子从烤箱里拿出来，弄碎鱼表面的那层盐，鱼皮就会从鱼身上剥落下来了。

entry.def: If something cracks, or if you crack it, it makes a sharp sound like the sound of a piece of wood breaking.

example.ex: Thunder cracked in the sky...
example.tran: 空中雷声咔嚓作响。

example.ex: He cracked his fingers nervously.
example.tran: 他紧张不安地把手指按得咔吧作响。

entry.def: If you crack a hard part of your body, such as your knee or your head, you hurt it by accidentally hitting it hard against something.

example.ex: He cracked his head on the pavement and was knocked cold.
example.tran: 他一头撞到人行道上，不省人事了。

entry.def: When you crack something that has a shell, such as an egg or a nut, you break the shell in order to reach the inside part.

example.ex: Crack the eggs into a bowl.
example.tran: 把鸡蛋打在一个碗中。

entry.tran: (尤指经过反复思考)找到…的解决办法，破译(密码)
entry.def: If you crack a problem or a code, you solve it, especially after a lot of thought.

example.ex: He has finally cracked the system after years of painstaking research.
example.tran: 经过多年的努力研究，他终于找到了破解这个系统的办法。

entry.def: If someone cracks, they lose control of their emotions or actions because they are under a lot of pressure.

example.ex: She's calm and strong, and she is just not going to crack...
example.tran: 她镇定而且坚强，绝不会垮掉。

example.ex: I had the conviction Larkin's nerve would crack and he'd squeeze the trigger in a reflex action...
example.tran: 我确信拉金会神经崩溃，他会反射性地扣动扳机。

entry.tran: (因感情强烈而嗓音)变嘶哑，变沙哑
entry.def: If your voice cracks when you are speaking or singing, it changes in pitch because you are feeling a strong emotion.

example.ex: Her voice cracked and she began to cry.
example.tran: 她的声音变得沙哑，继而哭了起来。

entry.def: If you crack a joke, you tell it.

example.ex: He cracked jokes and talked about beer and girls.
example.tran: 他爱说笑话，喜欢谈论啤酒和姑娘。

entry.def: If you say that something is not all it's cracked up to be, you mean that it is not as good as other people have said it is.

example.ex: Package holidays are not always all they're cracked up to be.
example.tran: 全包旅游并不总像人们说的那么好。

entry.def: A crack is a very narrow gap between two things, or between two parts of a thing.

example.ex: Kathryn had seen him through a crack in the curtains.
example.tran: 凯瑟琳透过窗帘缝看见了他。

entry.def: If you open something such as a door, window, or curtain a crack, you open it only a small amount.

example.ex: He went to the door, opened it a crack, and listened.
example.tran: 他朝门走去，打开一条门缝听着。

entry.def: A crack is a line that appears on the surface of something when it is slightly damaged.

example.ex: The plate had a crack in it...
example.tran: 盘子上有一道裂纹。

example.ex: Hundreds of office buildings and homes developed large cracks in walls and ceilings.
example.tran: 数百栋写字楼和住宅楼的墙壁和天花板上都出现了裂缝。

entry.def: A crack is a sharp sound, like the sound of a piece of wood breaking.

example.ex: Suddenly there was a loud crack and glass flew into the car...
example.tran: 突然发出一声巨大的爆裂声，玻璃碎片飞进了车里。

example.ex: 'Crack!' — The first shot rang out, hitting Paolo.
example.tran: “砰！”第一声枪响了，打中了保罗。

entry.def: If you have or take a crack at something, you make an attempt to do or achieve something.

example.ex: I should love to have a crack at the Olympia title in my last year...
example.tran: 我非常愿意在我职业生涯的最后一年向奥林匹亚大赛冠军头衔发起冲击。

example.ex: She decided to head for the dormitory to take another crack at locating Blanche.
example.tran: 她决定回宿舍再找找布兰奇。

entry.tran: (略显粗鲁或刻薄的)笑话，俏皮话
entry.def: A crack is a slightly rude or cruel joke.

example.ex: When Paul made the crack about the 'famous girl detective', I began to suspect that he had it in for you.
example.tran: 当保罗挖苦你是“著名的女侦探”时，我开始怀疑他是不是故意刁难你。

entry.tran: 强效可卡因;强力古柯碱
entry.def: Crack is a very pure form of the drug cocaine.

entry.tran: (士兵或运动员)训练有素的，一流的
entry.def: A crack soldier or sportsman is highly trained and very skilful.

example.ex: ...a crack undercover police officer...
example.tran: 训练有素的便衣警察

example.ex: He is said to be a crack shot, despite weak vision in one eye.
example.tran: 尽管一只眼视力较弱，他仍被称为神枪手。

entry.def: If you say that someone does something at the crack of dawn, you are emphasizing that they do it very early in the morning.

example.ex: I often start work at the crack of dawn when there is a big order to get out.
example.tran: 有大笔订单要处理时，我经常会清晨便开始工作。

entry.def: If you paper over the cracks, you try to hide all the things that are wrong with something.

example.ex: The meeting was stormy, and the two sides managed only to paper over the cracks on some issues.
example.tran: 会议很激烈，但双方只是在试图掩盖某些问题上的错误。

entry.tran: 合理的机会;均等的机会
entry.def: If you get a fair crack of the whip, you are allowed a reasonable opportunity to succeed at something.

example.ex: None of them is expecting any favours, just a fair crack of the whip.
example.tran: 他们谁也不期望受到任何特殊照顾，只希望机会均等。

auth_sentence.content: But cracks of light have begun to leak through.
auth_sentence.res_content: But cracks of light have begun to leak through.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But cracks of light have begun to leak through.

auth_sentence.content: Still, there are cracks in the ruling establishment.
auth_sentence.res_content: Still, there are cracks in the ruling establishment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Still, there are cracks in the ruling establishment.

auth_sentence.content: His complex philosophies are enlivened by often hilarious cracks.
auth_sentence.res_content: His complex philosophies are enlivened by often hilarious cracks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His complex philosophies are enlivened by often hilarious cracks.

Sentence.sentence: Houses built before 1939 use about 50% more energy per square foot than those built after 2000, mainly due to the tiny cracks and gaps that expand over time and let in more outside air.
